solution_line_template: Javier ate {javier_meat_ravioli_total_weight} ounces of meat ravioli because {javier_meat_ravioli_count} x {meat_ravioli_weight} = <<{javier_meat_ravioli_total_weight}={javier_meat_ravioli_total_weight}>>{javier_meat_ravioli_total_weight}

He ate {javier_pumpkin_ravioli_total_weight} ounces of pumpkin ravioli because {javier_pumpkin_ravioli_count} x {pumpkin_ravioli_weight} = <<{javier_pumpkin_ravioli_count}*{pumpkin_ravioli_weight}={javier_pumpkin_ravioli_total_weight}>>{javier_pumpkin_ravioli_total_weight}

He ate {javier_cheese_ravioli_total_weight} ounces of cheese ravioli because {javier_cheese_ravioli_count} x {cheese_ravioli_weight} = <<{javier_cheese_ravioli_count}*{cheese_ravioli_weight}={javier_cheese_ravioli_total_weight}>>{javier_cheese_ravioli_total_weight}

Javier ate {javier_total_weight} ounces in total because {javier_meat_ravioli_total_weight} + {javier_pumpkin_ravioli_total_weight} + {javier_cheese_ravioli_total_weight} = <<{javier_meat_ravioli_total_weight}+{javier_pumpkin_ravioli_total_weight}+{javier_cheese_ravioli_total_weight}={javier_total_weight}>>{javier_total_weight}
His brother ate {brother_total_weight} ounces of pumpkin ravioli because {brother_pumpkin_ravioli_count} x {pumpkin_ravioli_weight} = {brother_total_weight}
The winner ate {brother_total_weight} ounces in total because {brother_total_weight} > {javier_total_weight}
